short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Let you put tabs/windows aside so you can focus on something else and come back later.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Put-aside - Let you put tabs/windows aside so you can focus on something else and come back later.

Add the missing workspace feature to chrome.

Allow you to browse in separate spaces, you can either:
- Copy all the current tabs into a new workspace
- Create an empty workspace to work with
- Drag the workspace in the list to sort
All the windows and tabs will be saved automatically to the current workspace.

You can use this extension without moving your hand from your keyboard:
- Press C to copy all the windows/tabs to a new workspace
- Press E to open a new workspace
- Press 1, 2, 3 to choose a workspace to switch to
- Press Enter to confirm, Esc to cancel
